verses.roman:
hasta-padera sandhi saba vitasti-pramāṇe
sandhi chāḍi' bhinna haye, carma rahe sthāne

synonyms: hasta-padera—of the hands and legs; sandhi—joints; saba—all; vitasti—about eight inches; pramāṇe—in length; sandhi—joints; chāḍi'-dislocated; bhinna—separated; haye—become; carma—skin; rahe—remains; sthāne—in the place.
translation: The joints of His hands and legs would sometimes become separated by eight inches, and they remained connected only by the skin.
